dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kicking off today's episode with some really somber news, unfortunately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kicking off today's episode with some really somber news, unfortunately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty, uh, hard to hear about. What's the latest?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty, uh, hard to hear about. What's the latest?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, there was this tragic incident, just on the evening of June 23rd, on the Otar Almaty-1 railway section.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, there was this tragic incident, just on the evening of June twenty third, on the Otar Almaty-one railway section.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A tragic incident occurred on the evening of June 23 on the Otar " Almaty-1 section of the railway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Two people, um, entered the tracks at an unauthorized spot and were struck by a train.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Two people, um, entered the tracks at an unauthorized spot and were struck by a train.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two individuals entered the tracks and were struck by a train. ... Two people suddenly stepped onto the tracks at an unauthorized location...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, it's awful. The Kazakhstan Temir Zholy press service shared the details.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's awful. The Kazakhstan Temir Zholy press service shared the details.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Details of the incident were shared by the "Kazakhstan Temir Zholy" press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, they just walked onto the tracks?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, they just walked onto the tracks?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently. Between Aksenger and Burunday. They just stepped out in front of an oncoming train, trying to cross.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently. Between Aksenger and Burunday. They just stepped out in front of an oncoming train, trying to cross.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the press service, the incident took place between Aksenger and Burunday. Two people suddenly stepped onto the tracks at an unauthorized location in front of an oncoming train and attempted to cross to the other side.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the driver, um, couldn't stop?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the driver, um, couldn't stop?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. They sounded the horn, but the individuals didn't respond. And with such a short distance, the train just couldn't stop in time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. They sounded the horn, but the individuals didn't respond. And with such a short distance, the train just couldn't stop in time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The train driver sounded the horn, but the individuals did not respond. Due to the short distance, the train was unable to stop in time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, both pedestrians... [trails off sadly]

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, both died as a result. And now, the Transport Police, they've launched a criminal investigation into, like, railway safety violations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, both died as a result. And now, the Transport Police, they've launched a criminal investigation into, like, railway safety violations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Both pedestrians died as a result. The Transport Police Department has launched a criminal investigation into the violation of railway safety rules that led to the accidental death of two or more people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, makes sense. I mean, it's incredibly dangerous to be on the tracks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, makes sense. I mean, it's incredibly dangerous to be on the tracks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And it's not even the first close call recently, remember that bus in Zhambyl region?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it's not even the first close call recently, remember that bus in Zhambyl region?

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The one that almost got hit by a passenger train. Jeez.

dialogue_turns.text: So, just a stark reminder, uh, of railway safety, or the lack thereof, sometimes.
